description: Triangular array T read by rows: T(n,k)=t(n,2k+1) for 0<=k<=[ (2n-1)/2 ], T(n,n)=1, t given by A027926, n >= 0.
crossrefs: The row sums of this (slightly extended) bisection of the "Fibonacci array" A027926 are powers of 2, see A027935 for the other bisection.
author: _Clark Kimberling_
